dissertationData.additionalInfo:
1. Addition of yttrium oxide as an effective way to enhance the cycling stability of LiCoO2 cathode material for Li-ion batteries, Hubert Ronduda, Magdalena Zybert, Anna Szczęsna, Tomasz Trzeciak, Andrzej Ostrowski, Piotr Wieciński, Władysław Wieczorek, Wioletta Rarog-Pilecka, Marek Marcinek, Solid State Ionics, 355 (2020), 115426, 1.11.2020
2. 3. 5.
